fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Destroy a target's ability to remain stable.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**- This role will be changed in some way every day (unless i physically cannot). Changes will apply midgame. If this can kill, its cause of death will be hidden so I cannot modify it with a bias.**
- An unstable target will use a different role's ability on their target, this is randomized between a role of the same subalignment, but is not limited to faction (Town Killing can use Coven Killing, for example)
- The effect lasts until your death.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose.
